attributes.action: reverse government policy to privatise our air sea rescue services located around the uk....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is now Government policy to privatise our air sea rescue service in 2012.
Cost effective privatisation will result in reduced training, loss of professionalism, loss of dedication and commitment.  The knock on effect this will have on other support emergency services such as lifeboat, coastguard, mountain rescue, police and fire does not bare thinking about.
Air Sea Rescue will be replaced by an industry that will put profit before life.
Many these past few years on mainland Britain have experienced first hand the courageous efforts of this service which is rated 2nd to non.
